mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jd_home_order_appointed( b2b_order_id, order_no, master_name, master_phone, book_date, operate_time, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, quarter ) VALUES ( #{b2bOrderId}, #{orderNo}, #{masterName}, #{masterPhone}, #{bookDate}, #{operateTime}, #{remarks}, #{createById}, #{createDt}, #{updateById}, #{quarter} )
